description: Continuation pattern showing consolidation within parallel horizontal support and resistance lines during a downtrend. Represents temporary pause before downtrend resumes.
validationRules: Must form during an established downtrend
Clear horizontal support and resistance levels
Price bounces between support and resistance at least twice
Breakdown occurs downward through support with volume
Pattern usually takes 1-3 months to complete
invalidationSignals: Support or resistance lines slope significantly
commonMistakes: Trading inside the rectangle instead of waiting for breakdown
Entering on fake breakdowns - wait for volume confirmation
Not measuring rectangle height for target
Confusing with top/bottom formation in ranging market

tradeSetup.entry: Breakdown below support with 1.5x average volume
tradeSetup.stopLoss: Above most recent swing high or above resistance line
tradeSetup.target: Height of rectangle subtracted from breakdown point

supportive: Volume decreases during formation, spikes on breakdown
Moving averages still in bearish alignment

confluenceFactors: Forms in middle of strong downtrend (measured move)
Resistance aligns with key Fibonacci level
Forms after rally to moving average
